*sigh* I am very sorry to hear that Minime is gone. He was a very 
good person to RP with, one of the best in fact. I will surely miss 
him.

I will also participate in the day of silence, and I'll put a 
memorial on the Members page. However, I didn't know Minime 
personally, I only RPed with him, so I will need some help making the 
memorial.

He left me Fliq when he left NBW, and I never really got to RPing him 
(Fliq), but I will start now and RP him alot. I hope Minime is in a 
better place now.
